thread.title: Elon Musk elaborates on his proposal to nuke Mars
thread.title_full: Elon Musk elaborates on his proposal to nuke Mars

title: Elon Musk elaborates on his proposal to nuke Mars
text: Elon Musk elaborates on his proposal to nuke Mars Friday, 2 October 2015 (1 minute ago) A few weeks ago, SpaceX CEO Elon Musk was likened to a James Bond villain after he announced his idea to nuke Mars on The Late Show with Steven Colbert. He said it was the most rapid way to induce climate change on the planet. Now the billionaire has clarified those comments a bit further. He doesn't want to nuke the surface of Mars; he just wants to nuke the sky over the Martian poles every couple of seconds.
